segments.text: I wish you would not be so selfish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Selfishness is one human beings instincts . It is very difficult to get it out root and branch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you should at least consider your son's future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His mother , not me , should do this .
segments.speaker: S2
